name: [AI Tools 101] AI Summarisation with OpenAI and Google Sheets
description: Learn how to automate content summarisation using OpenAI's GPT models. This template is part of the [AI Tools 101 YouTube course series](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=htApI1WhnpE&list=PLrED3I754LhmTtlldfGklaEMh-ZaCa3EK&index=4&ab_channel=Make), providing step-by-step guidance to streamline your workflow with AI-powered summarisation. Follow along to effortlessly generate concise summaries from your data.
